00020    Cell::Cell()
00021     : begin_(0),
00022       offsetsPtr_(0),
00023       nextCellPtr_(0),
00024       nAtom_(0),
00025       atomCapacity_(0),
00026       isGhostCell_(true)
00027    {}

00029    void Cell::setOffsetArray(Cell::OffsetArray& offsets)
00030    {  offsetsPtr_ = &offsets; }

00032    void Cell::setIsGhostCell(bool isGhostCell)
00033    {  isGhostCell_ = isGhostCell; }

00036    {  nextCellPtr_ = &nextCell; }

00039    {  nextCellPtr_ = 0; }

00041    /*
00042    * Fill an array with pointers to atoms in a cell and neighboring cells.
00043    *
00044    * Upon return, the NeighborArray neighbors contains pointers to all of
00045    * the atoms this cell and neighboring cells.  The first nAtom() elements
00046    * are the atoms in this cell.
00047    *
00048    * \param neighbors array of pointers to neighbor Atoms
00049    * \param force if true, use reverse communication
00050    */
00051    void Cell::getNeighbors(NeighborArray &neighbors, 
00052                            bool reverseUpdateFlag) const
00053    {
00054 
00055       // Preconditions
00056       assert(offsetsPtr_);
00057       assert(!isGhostCell_);
00058 
00059       const Cell* cellPtr;
00060       int   ia, nc, na;
00061 
00062       neighbors.clear();
00063       nc = offsetsPtr_->size();
00064 
00065       if (reverseUpdateFlag) {
00066          for (int ic = 0; ic < nc; ++ic) {
00067             cellPtr = this + (*offsetsPtr_)[ic];
00068             if (cellPtr->id() >= id_) {
00069                na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00070                for (ia = 0; ia < na; ++ia) {
00071                   neighbors.append(cellPtr->atomPtr(ia));
00072                }
00073             }
00074          }
00075       } else {
00076          for (int ic = 0; ic < nc; ++ic) {
00077             cellPtr = this + (*offsetsPtr_)[ic];
00078             if (cellPtr->id() >= id_ || cellPtr->isGhostCell()) {
00079                na = cellPtr->nAtom();
00080                for (ia = 0; ia < na; ++ia) {
00081                   neighbors.append(cellPtr->atomPtr(ia));
00082                }
00083             }
00084          }
00085       }
00086    }
00087 
00088 }
00089 #endif
